item.title: YouTube Video Editor for Travel Content! - Upwork
item.description:
Join Our Team as a YouTube Channel Editor for Travel Content

We are seeking a skilled YouTube Channel Editor for our travel-focused channel, showcasing the world's most shocking moments. You'll create both long-form and short-form videos, integrate affiliate marketing, and enhance our content strategy for monetization.

Responsibilities:

Develop video content aligned with our channel’s niche and audience.
Produce high-quality, engaging videos.
Integrate affiliate links and branded content transparently.
Optimize video titles, descriptions, and tags for better visibility.
Engage with our audience through comments.
Analyze performance metrics to drive growth.
Requirements:

Proficient in video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.).
Strong understanding of YouTube algorithms.
Excellent communication and teamwork skills.
Familiarity with affiliate marketing.
Creative storytelling skills.
Ability to prioritize and meet deadlines.
If you’re passionate about travel and video editing, submit your proposal, cover letter, and portfolio links.

Apply now to help us share the world’s most shocking travel moments!

Thank you,
JMA Management Group LLC

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 19, 2024 11:05 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Male Jewellery Brand TikToks - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video editor to create captivating TikToks for our male jewellery brand. You will be working with raw footage and transforming it into engaging and visually appealing content that aligns with our brand image. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of the TikTok platform and be able to edit videos in a way that caters to our target audience. Attention to detail and creativity are key, as you will be responsible for selecting the best shots, adding effects, and incorporating music to enhance the overall impact of the videos.
   
   Skills needed:
   - Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
   - Familiarity with TikTok trends and video formats
   - Ability to create visually appealing transitions and effects
   - Strong sense of storytelling and pacing
   - Excellent time management and organization skills

Hourly Range: $15.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 10:47 UTC
Category: Logo Design
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: Hong Kong

item.description:
We need someone who will make video like this: https://www.youtube.com/shorts/gE50m_-tL6s.


About Us:
Trusfly is a leading company in the global health tourism industry, dedicated to providing top-notch healthcare services to our patients. We aim to promote our services through social media and are looking for a dynamic individual to join our team.

Position Description:
We are seeking a talented content creator to produce creative and impactful Instagram Reels and YouTube Shorts for Trusfly. This role is crucial for building a strong brand image in the health tourism sector and effectively communicating with our target audience.

Responsibilities:
Create engaging short videos to promote Trusfly's health tourism services
Follow current trends to produce creative and attention-grabbing content
Edit and montage videos to ensure high-quality production
Prepare content in formats suitable for various social media platforms
Analyze content performance and make improvements
Qualifications:
Experience in social media content creation
Proficiency with Instagram Reels and YouTube Shorts platforms
Creative thinking and storytelling skills
Proficiency in video editing software (Adobe Premiere, Final Cut Pro, etc.)
Attention to detail and result-oriented work ethic
Previous experience in creating content for the health or tourism sectors is a plus

Budget: $10

item.title: Screen Capture Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled individual who can create screen capture videos of our customer online journeys to act as short explainer videos. The videos should be around 8 to 20 seconds in length and should effectively showcase our customer experience. The main goal is to create engaging and informative videos that can be used as explainer videos on our website and social media platforms. The successful candidate should have experience in creating screen capture videos and possess excellent storytelling skills. Attention to detail and the ability to work independently are also essential.

Around 8 - 10 explainer videos required. these will need to be able to be hosted on our website and will sit in the help section and will be emailed to potential customers.

Skills needed:
- Screen capture software
- Video editing
- Storytelling
- Attention to detail

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 19, 2024 10:35 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing, Videography, Screencasting Video, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing, Videography, Screencasting Video, Video Post-Editing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: AI Video for Instagram promoting SpotTheSpy - Upwork
item.description:
About Us:
SpotTheSpy.com is a cutting-edge app designed to protect individuals from unauthorized access to their online accounts. Our app provides real-time alerts and peace of mind to users by notifying them if someone tries to access their accounts without permission.

Job Description:
We are seeking a talented and creative Video Content Creator to produce a promotional video for our app, SpotTheSpy. The video will be used on Instagram to highlight the app's features and demonstrate its real-world application. The ideal candidate will have experience in creating engaging and visually appealing videos using AI-generated content that feels authentic and relatable.

Responsibilities:
* Create a 60-second promotional video for SpotTheSpy.
* Use AI tools to generate "real" people and scenarios.
* Illustrate a scenario where a person is checking their spouse's mail in a house with apartments.
* Show the spouse on the street receiving a real-time alert from * SpotTheSpy that someone is accessing their account.
* Ensure the video is engaging, clear, and effectively communicates the app's value proposition.
* Edit and finalize the video to meet Instagram's specifications and best practices.

Requirements:
* Proven experience in video creation and editing, particularly for social media platforms.
* Proficiency with AI tools for generating realistic people and environments.
* Strong storytelling skills with the ability to convey complex ideas simply and effectively.
* Attention to detail and a keen eye for quality and consistency.
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.

Preferred Qualifications:
*Experience in creating promotional content for apps or tech products.
*Familiarity with Instagram's video guidelines and trends.
*Creative mindset with a passion for innovation and new technologies.

Application Process:
To apply, please submit the following:

A brief cover letter outlining your experience and why you're a good fit for this project.
A portfolio or examples of previous video projects, especially those involving AI-generated content.
Your proposed timeline for completing the video.

Compensation:
Competitive rate based on experience and quality of work.

Deadline:
Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis. Early submissions are encouraged.

Join us at SpotTheSpy.com and help us create a safer digital world, one alert at a time!

Hourly Range: $15.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 10:19 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Commercial, Social Media Marketing, Instagram, Video Editing, Sora
Skills: Video Commercial, Social Media Marketing, Instagram, Video Editing, Sora
Country: Denmark
click to apply

item.title: Looking For Youtube Expert For Faceless Channels - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a YouTube automation Expert to Manage and Grow our YouTube channels from Ground Up in selected niches for our clients.

This a complete execution project, where you will be responsible for creating the complete videos on topics provided by us.

You should have experience or a team with  :

- Voice Over Artists
- Video Editors
- Thumbnail Designers
- Researchers and Script Writers
- Expert Youtube channel Managers

This is a long-term opportunity and we will trust you with the growth and scaling of the channel.
We are looking to monetize the channel in 3-6 Months organically by producing content that aligns with YouTube guidelines.

Our main hiring parameter is results you must have result result-oriented portfolio.

Please apply only if you have experience in growing a channel from scratch to millions.

Happy to Pay $40 Per video at the start and scale to $55 per video going forward for video production and channel management.

Monthly - 5-10 Videos
Duration - 8 to 10 Mins


Niches: Crime, Sports, Finance, Top 10, Korean and others.
Reference - https://www.youtube.com/@CrazyforCrime-gj9nj/videos


Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 10:17 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:YouTube, YouTube Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, YouTube Automation
Skills: YouTube, YouTube Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, YouTube Automation
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Hook Video - Upwork
item.description:
Brief
Objective: Create a dynamic promotional video that showcases the versatility and imaginative aspects of 'The Kaleidoscope Classic' puzzle game. The video should evoke the feeling of entering a world of puzzling with great imaginative aspects, and be easy for anyone to understand.

Key Features to Highlight:

Versatility of the puzzle pieces.
Inclusion of recognizable shapes and patterns (e.g., animals, geometric patterns).
The transition from simple to complex puzzles.
The tactile and digital gameplay experience.
The imaginative and creative potential of the game.

Style and Tone:
Dynamic and engaging
Vibrant colors and fluid transitions
Playful yet sophisticated
Length: 60-90 seconds

Target Audience: Puzzle enthusiasts of all ages, families, and individuals who enjoy strategic and creative games.

Storyboard will be provided.


Posted On: June 19, 2024 10:16 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Photoshop, 3D Design, Video Commercial, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Photoshop, 3D Design, Video Commercial, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Experienced Designer Needed for Facebook Ad Creatives (Video & Image) - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and experienced designer to create engaging and high-converting Facebook ad creatives for our upcoming campaign. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record in designing both video and image ads optimized for Facebook.

Project Requirements:

Video Creatives:

3-5 short videos (15-30 seconds each)
High-quality graphics and animations
Engaging scripts and voiceovers (if needed)
Subtitles for accessibility

Image Creatives:

5-10 high-resolution images
Eye-catching designs with clear calls-to-action
Consistent branding elements
Responsibilities:

Collaborate with our team to understand campaign goals and target audience
Develop initial concepts and storyboards for approval
Design and produce final ad creatives optimized for Facebook
Revise and refine creatives based on feedback
Ensure timely delivery of all assets

Qualifications:

Proven experience in creating Facebook ad creatives
Strong portfolio showcasing video and image ad design
Proficiency in graphic design and video editing software
Excellent communication and collaboration skills
Ability to meet deadlines and work independently

How to Apply:
Please submit your proposal with the following:

Portfolio of relevant work
Brief overview of your experience
Estimated timeline and budget
We look forward to working with a creative professional who can help us achieve our campaign goals!

Hourly Range: $24.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 10:16 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Graphic Design, Adobe Illustrator, Social Media Imagery, Adobe Photoshop, Photo Editing, Facebook, Illustration, Banner Ad Design, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing
Skills: Graphic Design, Adobe Illustrator, Social Media Imagery, Adobe Photoshop, Photo Editing, Facebook, Illustration, Banner Ad Design, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing
Country: United Kingdom

item.title: YouTube Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
I have a YouTube channel with 6K subscribers and ambitions to grow it more this year.

These are my 3 most popular videos:

- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mrUrTyaYHEQ
- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5iVeCqq46VQ
- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XxelAOGo5xI

I have covered a range of topics but will now be focusing on marketing, entrepreneurship and leadership. As well as other things that go along with growing a business.

I already have one video editor who is great! With her help we have been producing about one video a week but we are now looking to up the output to 2x videos per week. Maybe even more.

I have a new video I would like you to edit (will be paid)

The best version will join the team.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 10:16 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United Kingdom

item.title: HZ Coming Soon Ad - Upwork
item.description:
Briefing for Commercial Video

Objective: Create a commercial spot to be used on our social media channels.

Brand Headline: Celebrate Your Day, Celebrate Your Beauty.

Instructions:
1. Use this video as the basis for creating the commercial.
2. The model in the video should be celebrating a significant moment in her life.
3. The background should change colors to highlight the arrival of a new nail polish brand.
4. Place the HIZIA brand logo on the left side of the video throughout its duration.
5. At the end of the video, include the following information in this order:
   1. HIZIA brand logo
   2. Celebrate Your Day
   3. Celebrate Your Beauty
   4. Coming Soon
   5. WWW.HIZIABEAUTY.COM

This video should capture the essence of celebration and beauty, aligning with our brand's slogan. The background color transitions should be smooth and attractive, reflecting the diversity and vibrancy of our nail polishes.



Posted On: June 19, 2024 10:15 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Promotional Video, Explainer Video, Video Commercial, Video Animation, Corporate Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Short Video Ad, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Video Advertising, Video Post-Editing, 2D Animation, Video Marketing
Skills: Promotional Video, Explainer Video, Video Commercial, Video Animation, Corporate Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Short Video Ad, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Video Advertising, Video Post-Editing, 2D Animation, Video Marketing
Country: PRT
click to apply
